attributes.action: Free N.H.S. Prescriptions for English people like Wales and Scotland have.
attributes.additional_details: We live in Great Britain and it would seam that the connected countries  have it better than we do when they are governed by the same government i.e. none of them are independent, how has this been allowed to happen and I'd like to see it given to all the British people.
attributes.background:
Give Fee N.H.S. prescriptions and make all N.H.S. services free including the dentist
Our National Insurance has just gone up by 10.5%, you reported 1.25% but that's a percentage of the overall wage so if you paid £300 a month previously you now pay £337.50 a month which is roughly a 10.5% increase

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592147
